name: Katoa
storyline: Become a Guardian of Light, with the power to build and nurture exotic, living habitats that exist not just in KATOA, but in the real-world too! Starting your adventure in the ocean depths, you'll explore breathtaking, true-to-life environments from the wildest frontiers of the natural world, and meet and collect the colorful wildlife you meet along the way.
summary: Create living habitats & help save the real world too! Build & nurture exotic, living habitats in Katoa, and help the real-world too! Habitats you grow, nurture, and protect in-game contribute $ to Earth Day, Great Barrier Reef Foundation, Save The Penguins & SOA. $50,000 campaign for Earth Day in May!
